meanings.definition: Relating to the part of the body situated behind the skull.
meanings.sent1: The postcranial bones support the body after the head.
meanings.sent2: The scientist studied the postcranial anatomy of the dinosaur.
meanings.sent3: The postcranial muscles were so strong, they could lift heavy weights effortlessly.
meanings.sent4: Her postcranial strength was like a hidden power waiting to be unleashed.
meanings.sent5: The postcranial structure of the animal was crucial for its balance and movement.

meanings.definition: In a manner pertaining to the region of the body located after the cranium.
meanings.sent1: The athlete moved postcranially, showcasing agility and speed.
meanings.sent2: The dancer gracefully leaped postcranially across the stage.
meanings.sent3: The cat postcranially chased its tail in a playful manner.
meanings.sent4: Time seemed to flow postcranially as she lost herself in the music.
meanings.sent5: The river meandered postcranially through the lush valley.
